org.alljoyn.bus
Class BusException

Object
  Throwable
      Exception
          BusException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnnotationBusException, ErrorReplyBusException, MarshalBusException
public class BusException
extends Exception

Base class of AllJoyn exceptions.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
BusException()
          Constructs a default BusException.
BusException(String msg)
          Constructs a BusException with a user-defined message.
BusException(String msg, Throwable cause)
          Constructs a chained BusException with a user-defined message.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class Throwable
fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getMessage, getStackTrace, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace, toString
 
Methods inherited from class Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

BusException

public BusException()
Constructs a default BusException.

BusException

public BusException(String msg)
Constructs a BusException with a user-defined message.

Parameters:
msg - user-defined message

BusException

public BusException(String msg,
                    Throwable cause)
Constructs a chained BusException with a user-defined message.

Parameters:
msg - user-defined message
cause - the cause of this exception
